title: The role of parasympathetic division of autonomic

content.prompt: The role of the parasympathetic division of the autonomic nervous system is to

choices.label: prepare the body to cope with stress
prompt the body to use its resources in responding to environmental stimuli
establish homeostasis after a fight-or-flight response

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
